revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Accentus redivivi: or, a defence of an accented pronunciation of Greek prose; shewing it to be conformable to all antiquity; together with an answer to the objection..."
revision.text: Possibly: Accentus redivivi: or, a defence of an accented pronunciation of Greek prose; shewing it to be conformable to all antiquity; together with an answer to the objections of Mekerchus, Isaac Vossius, Henninius, and other modern opposers of Greek accents. By William Primatt, M.A. ( Cambridge : Printed by J. Bentham Printer to the University, for the author...M.DCC.LXIV. [1764]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2449522~S1
